name: Postcards from the end of the world #1
description:
Postcards from the end of the world are the collection of a series of postcards that, one by one, explain the life of the dying traveler who sends them to his own home, to tell what happens to him during his trip. This man has promised to send postcards from every corner of the world wherever he goes, and even to send postcards from the end of the world.
Some postcards will have many editions and some will be very scarce, but all together they will tell the life of this traveler, who has left his home in search of certain death, in a strange place, in a foreign bed, far from everything and his loneliness.
Postcard #1: Cusco in Peru, the starting point. We still don't even know the name of the traveler, but we do know that he has just embarked on a great journey far away from everything, from a small town in the Peruvian Andes.
